00324 class DLLSYM IMAGELINE           //one line of image
00325 {
00326   public:
00327     uinT8 * pixels;              
00328     inT8 bpp;                    
00329 
00330     COLOUR_PIX operator[] (
00331     inT32 index) {
00332       return &pixels[index * 3]; //coercion access op
00333     }
00334 
00336     IMAGELINE() {
00337       linewidth = 0;
00338       line = NULL;
00339       pixels = line;
00340       bpp = 8;
00341     }
00342     void init(                //setup size
00343               inT32 width) {  //size of line
00344       if (width <= 0)
00345         width = MAXIMAGEWIDTH;
00346       if (width > linewidth) {
00347         if (line != NULL)
00348           free_mem(line);
00349         linewidth = width;
00350         line = (uinT8 *) alloc_mem (linewidth * sizeof (uinT8));
00351       }
00352       pixels = line;
00353       bpp = 8;
00354     }
00355     ~IMAGELINE () {              //destructor
00356       if (line != NULL)
00357         free_mem(line);
00358     }
00359 
00361     void set_bpp(inT8 new_bpp) {
00362       if (new_bpp <= 8)
00363         bpp = 8;
00364       else
00365         bpp = 24;
00366     }
00367 
00368     void init() {
00369       if (line == NULL)
00370         init (0);
00371       else {
00372         pixels = line;
00373         bpp = 8;
00374       }
00375     }
00376

00386                                 inT32 y,

00398     friend void IMAGE::get_column(inT32 x,
